long_description: A great performer in stormy weather, the REI Havenpass Earflap cap with eVent(TM) fabric has earflaps that fold down for added protection from the cold. eVent fabric has a unique membrane that allows sweat vapor to escape to the outside of the fabric in 1 easy step. No matter how hard you work, overheating is highly unlikely due to this Direct Venting(TM) technology. PrimaLoft(R) insulation in the crown and earflaps keeps your head warm; it's also water resistant and quick drying. Polyester microfleece lining wicks moisture away and dries quickly. Baseball-style cap with a shaped, stiffened brim channels rain away from your face and shields your eyes from sun; brim is 2.625 in. long. Bungee with cordlock lets you adjust the fit of the cap. Earflaps snap up on the sides of the REI Havenpass Earflap cap when not needed.
